title: I dreamed that I was washing clothes

preview.html: I dreamed that I was washing clothes through a website. See the website roy2a.com. Ablution is the purification of water from the secondary event by washing the face, hands, elbows, and wiping the head and feet. I have mentioned how to perform ablution in the Holy Qur’an and the Sunnah of the Prophet, and it is a duty that does not complete the prayer except with correct ablution, and about it. Seeing ablution in a dream. There is much evidence that we will talk about in this article by presenting the most important sayings of major interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. I dreamed that I was washing clothes. Seeing washing in a dream indicates the beginning of a new phase in the dreamer’s life. His life has changed for the better. Dreaming about performing the correct washing steps indicates comfort, comfort and almost safety in the dreamer’s life. Washing in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s kindness and that he is an honest and qualified man. Watching offers of washing with hot water in A state of bereavement or illness. Seeing incomplete washing in a dream indicates that there is nothing the dreamer is doing and its deficiency. A mistake in washing the steps in a dream for a woman indicates that she is not in purity. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing washing in a dream. I dreamed that I was performing ablution according to Ibn Sirini. A dream about washing with turbid water indicates corruption. And the theft of people’s rights. Seeing washing indicates something other than water. It is not suitable for washing, as mud is an indication of the worries and pains that the fortuneteller is in. If a person sees in a dream that he is washing, it is a good vision that portends the death of worry and sadness. Seeing washing inside the house in a dream is a reference to Ulster. And happiness and good food. Seeing washing and washing in a dream indicates the return of something lost from the fortuneteller. Washing the bed in a dream With the fortuneteller’s ability to move, it shows that he is lazy about his duties and does not have the ability to achieve his life goals. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing washing in a dream Interpretation of seeing washing in a dream For a single woman, seeing and completing ablution in a dream is a sign that her wedding is coming and her jacket is on. Seeing the completion of ablution in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates comfort, happiness, and the end of sorrows. Hot water solution for a woman’s sleep is a sign of illness or harm she will be exposed to in her life. Failure to complete ablution in a dream for unmarried women is an indication of an abandoned matter. And it will not be done, whether personally or professionally. Interpretation of seeing ablution in a married woman’s dream: Seeing ablution in a married woman’s dream is an indication of the purity of her heart, purity of her heart, and good character. Seeing the wrong ablution in a woman’s dream is a menstruating woman. If a married woman sees that she knows who is performing ablution in her sleep, it shows that she is a cooperative person. And good at helping people. Watching ablution with a group of married women. Referring to a Hajj or Umrah institution in the near future, God willing. Read another explanation: Interpretation of a dream about teaching ablution in a dream. Interpretation of seeing ablution in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing the completion of ablution in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of a lot of goodness and nourishment. It is also considered a vision of a pregnant woman washing herself, indicating ease of childbirth and health for her and her child. Seeing ablution with Zamzam water in a dream is a vision worthy of fulfillment.

title: Interpretation of a dream about descending and ascending in a dream

preview.html: Seeing stairs in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man who climbs the stairs or descends the stairs with difficulty, sitting on the broken stairs by Ibn Sirin, going down and up in a dream. One of the dreamer's somewhat ambiguous dreams, which we always see in a dream, shows us many upcoming events that will happen to the dreamer, as climbing the stairs is one of the important things that all people in public life do on a daily basis, and the day cannot end. Without going up or down the stairs in life, and when the dreamer sees that he is climbing the stairs in the dream, he needs a correct interpretation of the vision, which varies greatly from one person to another depending on its details and the dreamer’s situation. Interpretation of stairs in a dream: Seeing stairs, going up and down in a dream indicates reasons for rising and rising in this world and the afterlife, as well as possessions. In general, what does seeing a staircase in a dream indicate? Stairs can indicate problems that a person faces in his life. The staircase also indicates experiences that A person goes through it in real life. He was expressing the intention of his dream to travel to find a place where he could fulfill his dreams. The ladder could be an important person in the life of the one who saw the vision, and he is always with him to support and support him in his life. Climbing the stairs in a dream indicates success. Going up automatically means Failure. As for the vision of descending the stairs, what does it mean? - Scientists interpret this vision as evidence that the dreamer has lost power or a position he previously held. This dream symbolizes that the dreamer is going through some financial, family, or professional crises in his real life, and it also indicates the presence of an evil person who is constantly trying to reform him and steal his success. Is it possible that it is Seeing going down the stairs in your dream only carries negative interpretations. How do you interpret seeing going down the stairs with fear? Although this dream may spread fear in the dreamer’s mind, it indicates the safe return of someone close to the homeland. It also indicates recovery from illness. This can be interpreted as the opinion’s reluctance to make some fatal personal decisions, such as engagement, marriage, and divorce. This dream symbolizes To the dreamer’s fear of taking a serious stance on one of his investment plans. It is also possible that the interpretation comes in the context of the dreamer experiencing new experiences in his life. Interpretation of climbing the stairs in a dream by Ibn Sirin Climbing the stairs in a dream by one of the people known to the dreamer is evidence that the dreamer will achieve many Successes and excels in practical life and achieves his goals. Going down the stairs in a dream with a person unknown to the dreamer, is evidence of partnership or lineage with that person in the near future and he will have many good things in life because it will help him in all matters of life. Going up the stairs in a dream is evidence However, the dreamer strives and strives to achieve the dreams and aspirations that he seeks to achieve goodness. The staircase in the dream indicates that the dreamer will change his life for the better in the near future, and it also indicates that he will gain goodness, money, and a lot of blues. Interpretation of climbing the stairs in a dream for a single woman, an unmarried woman Climbing the stairs in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing my girlfriend committing adultery in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing my girlfriend committing adultery in a dream In case you want to know the interpretations of scholars regarding the dream interpretation of seeing my girlfriend committing adultery in a dream, we present below all of this and more..Interpretation of a dream about seeing my girlfriend committing adultery in a dream. Interpretation of dreams when I see my girlfriend committing adultery in a dream. Adultery can indicate betrayal and deception, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees adultery in a dream, it may be tantamount to theft, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees adultery in a dream, it may indicate problems and crises, and God is Great and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees adultery in a dream, it may be betrayal. And God knows all that is not seen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a famous bald woman in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a famous bald woman in a dream. Seeing a bald woman can represent injustice and corruption, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a bald woman in a dream, this may be evidence of the loss of someone she loves, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. When You see yourself sitting with a bald woman, she may show sadness, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees a bald woman in a dream, this may lead to fear, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a father committing adultery in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a father committing adultery in a dream can indicate bad things. And God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a father committing adultery in a dream, this may indicate shock, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees a father committing adultery in a dream, she may express disagreement, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees a father committing adultery in a dream, it may be This is a sign that his relationship with some close people will end, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mother committing adultery in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mother committing adultery in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing adultery can lead to failure to maintain trust and that God has knowledge of the unseen. Seeing adultery can also represent betrayal, and God knows best. When you see prostitution in a dream it can be a sign of deception and betrayal, and God knows all that He does not see the interpretation of dreams when I see my fiancée committing adultery in a dream. The interpretation of dreams to see my fiancée committing adultery in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a woman committing adultery in a dream could be a sign of doubt, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his wife cheating on him, this may lead them to being able to overcome problems and difficulties, and God knows best. When you see the wife cheating on a wealthy man, it may indicate... Experiencing financial losses, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my daughter committing adultery in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing my daughter committing adultery in a dream. Prostitution could be evidence of theft or committing some bad things, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees her daughter committing adultery violently, this may indicate fidelity. For the husband despite the troubles, and God knows the unseen. When a dreamer sees adultery in a dream, it may be betrayal, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a girl sees someone else

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing teeth falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing teeth falling out in a dream Interpretation of dreams about seeing teeth in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream about seeing the front or back teeth by Ibn Sirin through the Fikra website The connotations of seeing teeth in a dream by Imam Amin, Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, or Ibn Shaheen, and teeth are among the really important things in life They give a beautiful appearance and are used for chewing food. Seeing teeth in a dream has many effects, for example white teeth and elements of love, bonding and strong communication. The vision varies from one case to another. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Ibn Sirin’s front teeth. Interpretation of a dream about the upper front teeth falling out in a dream is from male relatives. The upper teeth in front indicate the father and uncle, or brothers or sons, while relatives are female relatives, and the two lower teeth in front indicate the mother and aunt, or two sisters and two daughters. When interpreted, the lower teeth are a better interpretation than the upper teeth. Falling out of the upper teeth means the loss of a close person. Or illness or death. As for the falling of the lower teeth, it indicates getting rid of the bad person who was harming you, or getting rid of a major problem, and the good news will come to me, God willing. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the falling of the lower teeth, from the point of view of the loss of his lower teeth, this indicates that the hours of misery and exhaustion have passed and are no longer present, and there is an explanation. That the dreamer will have good and good results. Teeth falling out from the bottom row indicates getting rid of the enemy. A virgin who dreams of her teeth falling out in the bottom row indicates that she will leave her fiancé, and that he will be miserable after her and that he will be at ease. Interpretation of a dream about seeing teeth in a dream for a single woman if A single girl sees in her dream that her teeth are falling out, this means that she is disappointed because of her shock to a specific person, or the dream may indicate that she wants to link her need to someone next to her. She exchanges the feelings of love and tenderness that she misses in her life, even if her teeth fall out from the top of her forehead, which means that she will lose her relationship with someone close to her or break it. As for the loss of the lower teeth, it is better for her to come to her soon, and if she is engaged and her lower tooth falls out, this means that she She will break up with her fiancé, and there will be goodness and a better future. For her, God willing. Interpretation of tooth loss for a married woman: Seeing a married woman with children and seeing her dream of her teeth falling out shows her extreme fear for her children. If a married woman who has not given birth sees them falling out in a dream, this means that God is bestowed with the blessing of children, and there is another interpretation that says that teeth The fallen one indicates cutting off one’s livelihood and entering into a temporary economic situation. Crisis. Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that her teeth are falling out, this indicates the arrival of a new baby (male), and God knows best. Interpretation of teeth falling out in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. He says that if he sees any defect in his teeth, this indicates the presence of a dispute between his family and his separation. It may indicate a shortage of some of his money. But if it is a human

title: The 9 most important interpretations of seeing smoking in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing smoking? It means the company of evil and immoral people. The interpretation of seeing a man smoking in a dream? It means problems and fears. What is the interpretation of seeing someone smoking in front of you in a dream? This means that there are differences between you and this person. What does it mean to see that you feel joyful while smoking? It indicates that you You feel lonely and disturbed in reality. What is the interpretation of a vision of smoking for a pregnant woman? It means the difficulties she faces during pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about smoking. Smoking refers to malicious speech that harms others if the air comes out of your mouth while smoking. It is said that smoking is listening to corrupt words that harm the soul. He said Contemporaries Smoking means accompanying bad and immoral people or the bad environment in which you live. If you are a merchant, dreaming that you smoke and you are not a smoker in reality means that your money is blocked. Smoking is magic and sorcery, because they use fire and smoke. A man’s dream of smokingThe interpretation of smoking for a man is good If he owns a factory or works in a factory, because smoking is a substance that works in the combustion system. You may be making a new machine deal soon if you are the owner of the factory. Or the factory owner buys a modern machine that provides you with comfort if you are a factory worker. If you work on things that are not related to machines. It has been said that it indicates deterioration in your health. The illness may be angina, loss of teeth, or a disease in your mouth, especially if you were not a smoker in the first place. Dream of a single smoker Smoking means marriage, or moving to a new home, because the home’s chimney works by removing smoke. Smoking indicates finding a new job in a restaurant or factory if you are unemployed. Interpretation of seeing smoking means that you are a young man who is wasting money and spending it on useless things. Smoking means confusion and distraction. Interpretation of a dream about smoking for a single woman. Smoking for a girl has consequences in her life because there are many Of the places that prevent smokers from entering and therefore there are consequences that prevent her and what she wants. If she applies for a job, she will be rejected and it also suggests that she is a girl who is in contact with her parents and does not forgive them. As for finding someone smoking in front of you in a dream, it means that there are differences between you and this person if you You already know it. But if you see a strange man smoking in front of you, you may already marry a smoker. Interpretation of a dream about smoking for a pregnant woman Smoking for a pregnant woman means difficulties that you will find during pregnancy, but you will get rid of them quickly. A cigarette means a bad boy, because the air is expelled from the body, and the child is expelled From the mother’s body. The interpretation of seeing smoking in a dream means problems or material losses that you will be exposed to. If the cigar smoke is light in color, it means short success. If you feel happy while smoking, it means that you feel lonely and anxious in reality.

A cigarette means a bad boy, because the air is expelled from the body, and the child is expelled From the mother’s body. The interpretation of seeing smoking in a dream means problems or material losses that you will be exposed to. If the cigar smoke is light in color, it means short success. If you feel happy while smoking, it means that you feel lonely and anxious in reality.

title: More than 100 interpretations of a dream about prison according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about prison Interpretation of a dream about prison Prison is one of the words that have a painful effect on human souls, as it includes many bad connotations, including psychological and physical, so the interpretation of a dream about prison in a dream often carries many unpleasant meanings, but it can also put an end to the injustice of the oppressors and be a strong deterrent to correcting the rights of its people and their injustices. What is the interpretation of a dream about prison? Prison Dream Interpretation is evidence of the presence of many negative thoughts that surround the dreamer's life and control his mind permanently. It also expresses a person who feels weak and weak as he always mentions that he lacks the ability and courage to achieve his hopes and goals in life. Imprisonment in a dream is considered one of the disturbing visions that raise doubts and anxiety in the soul from the bad events that the future may bring to the dreamer. Prison is a punishment for those who commit a heinous crime that violates traditions and customs, so his vision is represented by someone who committed an act that violates religion and the law and he knows that. Sometimes we express the bad emotional state of a person by saying that he is in a psychological prison, which means that the viewer lives in a state of depression and a desire for isolation About the world. If the dreamer sees that he is in a prison with no light except the moonlight from above, this indicates that the Creator saw his complaint in which he was falsely accused and will soon prove his innocence. It also indicates attachment to a specific place and the inability to live a normal life, perhaps due to coercive obstacles related to certain circumstances or psychological and personal restrictions. But this also means staying in one place for a long time and can be a sign that the dreamer cannot change his current situation because he will remain in it for several years. Interpretation of the dream of prison by Ibn Sirin It is seen that this vision often expresses bad psychological feelings that dominate the dreamer's life and make him limited in movement despite his good health. Imprisonment indicates that there is an event that will continue for a long time for its owner, whether it is a good and happy situation or the difficulty of unhappy moments. It is also one of the dreams that expresses the many sins and bad deeds committed by the dreamer, and that he must quickly return from this path before it is too late. It also expresses the bad intentions and feelings of hatred and malice of the viewer towards some of those around him, which greatly changed his personality and human nature. Interpretation of the dream of prison in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq The interpretation of this vision is related In his opinion, it is often related to the religious aspect of the dreamer’s life, either as an expression of his feelings or personal qualities, or as a warning against committing sins that may anger his Lord. He says that it sometimes reflects the dreamer’s good health and physical fitness, which allows him to live in good health and a long life (God willing). Imam al-Sadiq’s opinion is that prison may carry a warning message to the dreamer, to warn him of the dire consequences of some satanic, devilish ideas that he has and wants to implement. It also expresses the person who tries as much as possible to stay away from the sources of evil in life that threaten his life and personal qualities.

Interpretation of a dream about prison in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. The interpretation of this vision, in his opinion, is often linked to the religious aspect of the dreamer’s life, either as an expression of his feelings or personal qualities, or as a warning against committing Sins that may displease his Lord. title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of removing a decayed tooth, the interpretation of the dream of removing the upper molar without pain, and the interpretation of the dream of removing a decayed tooth without pain.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about removing damaged teeth: Some people feel afraid when they see a dream about removing a rotten tooth and they believe that the dream contains some things that explain evil to them, and dream interpreters show that there are many negative and positive things associated with this vision, and therefore there are many clues that we will present in this Article.Interpretation of a dream about tooth extraction by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about removing damaged teeth. Extracting a rotten tooth in a dream proves many things, and Imam Nabulsi says that it is one of the indications of the dreamer’s tooth, and the matter varies depending on the position of the tooth removed. If the position of this tooth is at the top, it increases nutrition and quality. Which belongs to the dreamer. Removing a rotten tooth from the top of the mouth can be attributed to the abundance of economic sustenance and the restoration of a person’s economic conditions after standing still for several days. Tooth decay is a bad thing that harms many people, and therefore getting rid of this tooth is a pleasant matter, God willing. For the dreamer, it conveys joy and good news to his soul and heart. In the event that someone is afraid of having this tooth extracted and is very afraid of it, dream experts predict that he is always worried in reality, in addition to the great tension that he carries in his heart. Some interpretive scholars believe that the idea of ​​molars falling out without feeling any pain It is a sign of doing some undeserved actions that will not affect others and will not benefit the person. Interpretation of the dream of tooth extraction by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that rotting molars in a dream are generally signs of dangers and crises that a person rejects and always tries to defend against, and therefore if If he could remove this rotten thing from his mouth without pain, he would be able to overcome the difficulties and crisis. Stressful things in his reality. Removing a molar by hand shows that the dreamer is always defending himself and his life and is constantly trying to keep sadness and problems away from him. An unmarried woman’s vision of the previous dream is considered something worthy of praise for her, which is a harbinger of death in a period free of distress and sadness and full of success and work. If the doctor succeeds in removing the rotten tooth from the dreamer’s mouth, there is a good chance that the life of the dreamer will be extended in the near future and his life will improve in general. This dream indicates salvation from some difficult circumstances and sorrows related to money or psychological distress, which means that the person has good chances. Many to change the difficulties, and God knows best. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about removing a rotten tooth for a single woman. Those interested in the science of interpretation believe that removing a sore tooth from unmarried women will rid her of corrupt friends. Who cause her trouble and misery, and thus she will be able to get rid of them and know their true character yet. This dream. If this divorce is painless, then this single woman is on a new and happy path through which she can fulfill her dreams and achieve some...

title: Interpretation of seeing a cake in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cake: Cakes mean a good biography that people will enjoy or beautiful words that speak about you in your absence. Interpretation of seeing cakes means new friendships with people who benefit from their knowledge or share business with them. Seeing many pieces of cake spread throughout your home means spending a good time with Whoever you love from family or friends. If you ate a cake in your dream and felt that it tasted delicious, then this is money that you can afford, and it was said that it is an inheritance. Interpretation of seeing a cake in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained that seeing cakes in a dream means that you will get some money. Seeing him eating cakes, but greedily, is evidence that he needs love and affection in his life. When the dreamer sees cakes in a dream, it means that the time of travel is approaching. Holiday cakes are a sign of new and sweet relationships between new friends. Seeing cakes in a dream is for a single woman. A dream about cakes is considered Singles are a good sign, only if the cakes are stacked on the plate in a beautiful way and are white or sprinkled with sugar. While cake crumbs mean money that you benefit from for a certain period of time, eating cake is the nutrition that goes into your bag, and cake is easy money. Seeing cakes in a dream for a married womanInterpretation of seeing cake in a dream for a married woman means money that has been saved for a long time, For this reason, some contemporary interpreters said that it is an inheritance, because the inheritance, whether it is land or real estate, is money, but you get it after a certain period of time, so it is stored money, and a married woman seeing cakes in her house may be happy news for her, especially if the Eid cakes may indicate To the return of her husband and son, if he travels and eats cake among your family members, it means the end of arguments and fights between you. Seeing maamoul in a dream: Maamoul is a cake in a dream, but maamoul means abundant and plentiful goodness because it is sweeter than cake. If you eat maamoul, then you feel deprived and lose valuable things in your life. Dream With cake and not eating it means that you are not spending your money, but rather saving something after a while. It is said that maamoul, which is also cake, means that it comes to you if it is dark in color or if you feel some fear and anxiety. Interpretation of seeing cakes in a single person’s dream: It is said that he travels if he is looking for an opportunity Action.Interpretation of a dream about sesame cake. The interpretation of seeing plain cakes does not differ from that of sesame cakes, because if the shape of the cake is circular, this means that you will return to your old state, whether it was good or bad, and God knows best.

title: What is the interpretation of police in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: The police in a dream: Seeing the police is one of the visions around which there is a lot of disagreement among jurists, and perhaps it is one of the visions that raises panic and fear in the heart. However, the majority of issues involving police surveillance are issues that are highly praiseworthy and approved by jurists, and in this article we address the bad and good aspects of this vision, with the details and psychological and legal implications in more detail and explanation. Police in a dream Seeing the police expresses the fears that reside in the heart, Self-talk, nervous tension, burdensome responsibilities and duties, and the desire to gain freedom and freedom from the restrictions that surround the individual. The police also express useful solutions. If a man sees a policeman in his home, this is a dispute that ends and a problem ends, and a quarrel with the police is interpreted as a violation of the law. And order and engaging in actions that require punishment and can cause serious damage. Whoever sees that he is communicating with the police, he is asking for help and assistance in reality and seeks to achieve justice and restore violated rights. As for the death of the police, it is interpreted as the spread of injustice and the spread of corruption, and the traffic police symbolizes the facilitation and completion of projects. Unfulfilled. The police in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that a policeman or policeman indicates panic, sadness, sorrow, terror, excessive worries, and deprivation of the emotions of the heart. Chasing the police means transferring customs and laws and deviating from established norms, and the policeman is for the guilty and the guilty means the angel of death, and seeing the police expresses the commandments Commandments, trust, duties, rights, and imprisonment indicate intense disagreement and bitter hostility. Seeing the police has other connotations, such as: it is a symbol of safety, security, and protection from enemies and evil, good news, and bringing reassurance and stability to justice and the believer. His vision also expresses victory, triumph, great benefit, and the realization of truth, justice, and authority over oppressors and lying men. The police in a dream for a single woman. Seeing the police symbolizes protection, safety, and tranquility. Whoever sees the police, this means protection from perpetrators and oppressors and the restoration of stolen rights. Talking to the police means following established laws and customs without deviating from them, no matter how strict they are. Seeing the police helping shows a way out of distress thanks to someone helping her and making her life easier. But if she sees the police arresting her, this indicates that she has committed an act that deserves punishment, and seeing the police being chased She expresses her fears and concerns that she is driving her car on unsafe roads. The police in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the police indicates the fulfillment of desires, the restoration of rights, the distribution of duties among family members, and the implementation of a stable and unchanging system. If she sees the traffic police, this indicates that she has overcome The difficulties and obstacles that stand in her way, making it easier for her to reach her destination. And if she sees the police searching her house, this is a sign that someone is breaking into her and revealing her secrets to the public. Behavior that spoils its efforts and falling into evil and intrigue. The police in a dream is a sign

title: Interpretation of a dream about a new spacious apartment

preview.html: It also indicates that the dream of a married woman shows her happy married life and indicates to a divorced woman that her wedding date is approaching. Interpretation of seeing a new spacious apartment in a dream for a single girlIf a single girl sees in a dream that she wants to live in a new spacious apartment. Here is an indication of her desire to get married in the coming period and she will give birth to him. God willing. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means seeing a new, spacious and beautiful apartment in a dream. It is an indication of the beautiful life that she is living, and that she is going through in this period of her life. The only girl who sees that she is looking at the new spacious apartment and wants to buy it. This is an indication of Her intense desire to get rid of everything that saddens her in her life. And the only girl who dreams of buying a new, spacious apartment. This is an indication that he will live with great and abundant livelihood in the future, God willing. See also: Interpretation of dreams of a beautiful spacious house. Interpretation of seeing a new spacious apartment in a dream for a married woman. I saw a married woman in a dream. She lives in a new and very spacious apartment. She declares that she lives with comfort, joy and great happiness in her life, God willing. And if a married woman sees in a dream that she enters a large and spacious apartment in a dream. It shows that he will get rid of the problems he is going through and live normally. Comfortable. If a married woman sees the new spacious apartment from afar and wants to enter, this is a sign that she is looking to get rid of many negative things in her life. A married woman is looking for a new apartment in a dream and it is spacious. Here is a clear explanation that she lives in new and beautiful things, and there are many in her life. God willing. Interpretation of seeing a new spacious apartment in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she sees a new spacious apartment in a dream and it is beautiful. This is a sign that this divorced woman will get rid of very big problems in her life. And seeing the divorced woman looks from afar at the new apartment. The spacious one. It indicates that she desires a lot of peace and comfort, and to stay away from trouble in her life, God willing. And if the divorced woman sees in a dream the new spacious apartment, and she desires it. This indicates her desire to get married during this time, and that she is looking for the right person for her, and God knows best. The divorced woman Who is looking for a new, spacious apartment to buy in a dream and she is happy. It indicates that she will make some right decisions in her life and she will be happy with that. Read also: Interpretation of seeing entering or buying a new house in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a new apartment in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a man sees a dreamer in a dream, He sees the new spacious apartment in a dream and is happy. It indicates the abundance of food that he will eat in the coming period, God willing. And if a man is searching in a dream for a new spacious apartment in a dream, and wants to buy it. He announces that he will soon marry a good woman, which will make him happy. In addition to seeing the man in a dream, he is looking for a new apartment in the dream, but he did not find it. This is an indication that there are sad things that he is going through in his life and he could not get rid of them easily. As for the man who enters my grandfather’s apartment
